content:
Posted: March 18
												So far I am digging this game. The music and sfx are great. It is a little tough to get the hang of at first, but replaying and trying again are satisfying and it feels good to progress to new levels. I am using a keyboard right now but will try with a controller next time. The visual style is great. The combination of blue collar aesthetic and outer space remind me of the grittiness of Star Wars and Alien franchises, but with a humorous angle.

content:
Posted: March 15
												Blue-Collar Astronaut is a fun and challenging game. If you have hair, you have been warned as this tricky game will end up you pulling out all of it. Maybe wear an astronaut helmet so this does not happen... but I did enjoy it a lot and the graphics, music and humour are spot on. Give it a shot
